messages.title: WORKING HARD TO MAKE SCOTLAND BETTER.
messages.content: We will build on the progress that has been made in Scotland over these past four years. With your support on May 5th we can.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Easing the pressure on family budgets.
Ensuring waiting times are shorter and treatment continues to improve.
Help us reduce crime levels further.
Should be able to choose our nation's future in an independence referendum.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Secure Jobs in the Low Carbon Economy
keyPolicies.policyDescription: With Scotland leading the world in offshore renewable technology.
No tuition fees or graduate contribution.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Reduce by Half the Number of Pupils
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Taught in the worst condition schools.

issues.health: Protect investment in the NHS, with year on year spending increases, ensuring waiting times are shorter and treatment continues to improve.

leaflet.personalStatement: A PERSONAL MESSAGE FROM FIONA: My immediate family has lived in Bearsden for over 50 years with relatives in Lenzie and Bishopbriggs. We are rooted in this community. We have used local services from schools to community care which means that I have a first-hand knowledge and understanding. I have been involved with local voluntary organisations for over 20 years ranging from Convenor of The Community Council, to founding member of a Youth Club and East Dunbartonshire Children's Panel Advisory Committee. MSP for the West of Scotland, covering East Dunbartonshire from 2007 to 2013. You can depend on me to always work for the best interests of our towns and villages. After the 2007 election I met so many people who said they'd ticked-off voting SNP and now wished they had. Now you can make that crucial decision based on the SNP Government's proud record of achievements and our vision for a better future for Scotland. Yours for Scotland Fiona

politicalExperience.role: MSP for the West of Scotland

contactInformation.address: FREESPOST RTKL-HTXL-LRJB, SNP, 3 Jackson's Entry, Edinburgh, EH8 8PJ

images.caption: Alex Salmond leads an experienced government team with a strong record on policy delivery and with real ambition for our nation's future success.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Help us build a better nation. Visit: bepartofbetter.net
